mapper.select:
SELECT B.areacode, B.regOrgCode, B.localadmCode,
B.areacode deptName,
C.Content deptName,
B.publicInfo, B.regstateK, B.regstateD, B.regstateC, B.regstateQ, B.regstateXX, B.altItemH, B.altItemT, B.mortH, B.mortT, B.pledgeH, B.pledgeT, B.ippldgH, B.ippldgT, B.tmH, B.tmT, B.spotcheckH, B.spotcheckT, B.sfH, B.sfT, B.licenceH, B.licenceT, B.punishH, B.punishT, B.opanomlyH, B.opanomlyT, B.illDisHoneH, B.illDisHoneT, B.escH, B.escT FROM ( SELECT A.areacode, A.regorgCode, A.localadmCode, sum(A.publicInfo) publicInfo, sum(A.regstateK) regstateK, sum(A.regstateD) regstateD, sum(A.regstateC) regstateC, sum(A.regstateQ) regstateQ, sum(A.regstateXX) regstateXX, sum(A.altItemH) altItemH, sum(A.altItemT) altItemT, sum(A.mortH) mortH, sum(A.mortT) mortT, sum(A.pledgeH) pledgeH, sum(A.pledgeT) pledgeT, sum(A.ippldgH) ippldgH, sum(A.ippldgT) ippldgT, sum(A.tmH) tmH, sum(A.tmT) tmT, sum(A.spotcheckH) spotcheckH, sum(A.spotcheckT) spotcheckT, sum(A.sfH) sfH, sum(A.sfT) sfT, sum(A.licenceH) licenceH, sum(A.licenceT) licenceT, sum(A.punishH) punishH, sum(A.punishT) punishT, sum(A.opanomlyH) opanomlyH, sum(A.opanomlyT) opanomlyT, sum(A.illDisHoneH) illDisHoneH, sum(A.illDisHoneT) illDisHoneT, sum(A.escH) escH, sum(A.escT) escT FROM cs_rpt_public_info A WHERE 1=1
and monthCode = left(#{endCheckPushDate},6)
GROUP BY A.${statLevel}Code ) B
LEFT JOIN zjcsdb1.cs_code_regorg C ON B.regOrgCode=C.Code
LEFT JOIN zjcsdb1.cs_code_regunit C ON B.localAdmCode=C.Code

if.test: statLevel != null and statLevel != '' and statLevel == 'pubtotal'

select.if: SELECT sum(A.publicInfo) publicInfo FROM cs_rpt_public_info A where 1=1

if.test: statLevel != null and statLevel != '' and statLevel == 'pubregstate'

select.if: SELECT sum(publicInfo) publicInfo ,sum(A.regstateK) regstateK,sum(A.regstateD) regstateD, sum(A.regstateC) regstateC,sum(A.regstateQ) regstateQ,sum(A.regstateXX) regstateXX FROM cs_rpt_public_info A where 1=1

if.test: statLevel != null and statLevel != '' and statLevel == 'pubinfo'

select.if: SELECT sum(licenceH) licenceH ,sum(A.licenceT) licenceT,sum(A.opanomlyH) opanomlyH, sum(A.opanomlyT) opanomlyT,sum(A.illDisHoneH) illDisHoneH,sum(A.illDisHoneT) illDisHoneT, sum(A.punishH) punishH,sum(A.punishT) punishT,sum(A.caseH) caseH,sum(A.caseT) caseT, sum(A.otherpunishH) otherpunishH,sum(A.otherpunishT) otherpunishT FROM cs_rpt_public_info A where 1=1

if.test: statLevel != null and statLevel != '' and statLevel == 'pubentbaseinfo'

select.if: SELECT sum(mortH) mortH ,sum(A.mortT) mortT,sum(A.pledgeH) pledgeH, sum(A.pledgeT) pledgeT,sum(A.ippldgH) ippldgH,sum(A.ippldgT) ippldgT, sum(A.tmH) tmH,sum(A.tmT) tmT, sum(A.spotcheckH) spotcheckH,sum(A.spotcheckT) spotcheckT, sum(A.sfH) sfH,sum(A.sfT) sfT,sum(A.altItemH) altItemH,sum(A.altItemT) altItemT, sum(A.invH) invH,sum(A.invT) invT,sum(A.memH) memH,sum(A.memT) memT,sum(A.supH) supH,sum(A.supT) supT, sum(A.liqH) liqH,sum(A.liqT) liqT FROM cs_rpt_public_info A where 1=1

mapper.select: select sum(spotcheckH) spotcheckH,sum(spotcheckT) spotcheckT,sum(punishH) punishH, sum(punishT) punishT,sum(opanomlyH) opanomlyH, sum(opanomlyT) opanomlyT,sum(illDisHoneH) illDisHoneH, sum(illDisHoneT) illDisHoneT , sum(otherpunishH) otherpunishH ,sum(otherpunishT) otherpunishT, sum(ifnull(spotcheckotherH,0)) spotcheckotherH ,sum(ifnull(spotcheckotherT,0)) spotcheckotherT, 0 otherpanomlyH,0 otherpanomlyT,0 otherillDisHoneH,0 otherillDisHoneT from cs_rpt_public_info t where monthCode = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m')
